ks.common.view
Class FanPileView

java.lang.Object
  ks.common.view.Widget
      ks.common.view.RowView
          ks.common.view.FanPileView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ElementListener
public class FanPileView
extends RowView

Represents a Fan of n cards from which only a single card may be selected, but there may be more than n cards in the model element column.

As soon as a card is selected, the n+1th card (if it exists) is made visible.

Closest relative is the RowView. Because FanPileView extends RowView, the returnWidget() method for RowView is used successfully.

Creation date: (12/1/01 9:03:44 AM)

Author:
George T. Heineman (heineman@cs.wpi.edu)
